name: Spaceslingers (itch)
description:
Spaceslingers is a fun and mind-bending puzzle game, where the only obstacles between you and your goal are the most powerful objects known to mankind! Use the gravity wells created by black holes to slingshot your cargo ship to the correct destination.

Controls
Hold the left mouse button down and drag the mouse to adjust the angle and power of your launch. The rest is up to the universe.

Level Editor
If you feel like it, dive into the Level Editor to create your own physics puzzles. Hold shift and click the mouse to place black holes, click on an object to select it and hold the mouse button down to drag it around, everything else should be pretty self evident.
